about_the_game:
Lose yourself in a unique and colorful universe of real miniature artworks. While you travel across mythical and historical lands, listen to long-forgotten tales, dive into Eastern mythology, and unravel the mysteries hidden within the unique puzzles.

During this journey through the 16th to 18th centuries of Ottoman and Persian culture, you'll also meet people from diverse backgrounds, face ancient creatures, wander through streets and palaces, and be a part of exciting historical events.

This once enchanting world is now on the verge of being forgotten. It is in your hands to solve mysteries and puzzles to bring the miniature universe back to life again.

Features

  • Colorful masterpieces from Eastern miniature painting
  • Timeless folk tales of love, loss, victories and hopes
  • The richness of Eastern mythology
  • Original soundtracks make you feel the atmosphere of the time period by using traditional instruments
  • A book of travels where you can collect beauty and story from your adventures
  • A compelling narrative intertwines the gameplay and puzzles
  • Pressure-free, unique puzzles.
  • Holistic atmosphere, where period melodies, historical events, dialogues, people, and architecture breathe life into every moment
